issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body:
In order to diagnose your issue further, please provide the following information

1. Titanium CLI + SDK version
2. A simple test case with actual/expected result
3. Device/Simulator information.
Resolving this ticket as there is not much information in this report to diagnose it further and the reporter has not provided the requested information.
